title: Creating an Interview with Job Description
steps: Go to the interview creation page
Enter a job description or use the enhanced JD feature to generate one
Verify that skill recommendations are displayed
expected_result: Skill recommendations are displayed based on the job description

title: Selecting Skills and Difficulty Level
steps: Select skills from the AI-suggested list or add custom skills
Choose a difficulty level for the questions (hard, moderate, etc.)
expected_result: Skills and difficulty level are saved successfully

title: Reviewing and Customizing Standard Questions
steps: Review the standard questions generated by the AI
Personalize the options for each question
Check the box next to a preferred answer
expected_result: Standard questions are updated with customizations

title: Reviewing and Customizing Role-Based Questions
steps: Review the role-based questions generated by the AI
Modify the question and ideal answer if needed
expected_result: Role-based questions are updated with customizations

title: Creating the Interview
steps: Click the 'Create' button to create the interview
expected_result: The interview is created successfully and a unique public interview link is generated

title: Verifying Interview Link
steps: Verify that the link is unique and exclusive to the interview
expected_result: The public interview link is valid and unique

title: View candidate responses
expected_result: Candidate responses are displayed with structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resumes.

title: View detailed AI analysis scores
expected_result: Detailed AI analysis scores are displayed for the candidate.

title: View comprehensive interview summary
expected_result: A comprehensive summary of the interview is displayed, including observations, positives, and negatives.

title: Select or reject candidate
expected_result: Candidate is successfully selected or rejected.

title: Upload resumes for screening
expected_result: Resumes are successfully uploaded for screening.

title: View resume screening results
expected_result: Resume screening results are displayed, including AI recommendations and scores.

title: Send interview link to candidate
expected_result: Interview link is successfully sent to the candidate.
